original_text: And the nations will know that the people of Israel went into exile for their sin, because they were unfaithful to me. So I hid my face from them and handed them over to their enemies, and they all fell by the sword.
korean_text: 여러 민족은 이스라엘 족속이 그 죄악으로 말미암아 사로잡혀 갔던 줄을 알지라 그들이 내게 범죄하였으므로 내 얼굴을 그들에게 가리고 그들을 그 원수의 손에 넘겨 다 칼에 엎드러지게 하였으되

sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 여러 나라가 알게 될 것이다

sentences.original_text: that the people of Israel went into exile for their sin
sentences.korean_translation: 이스라엘 백성이 그들의 죄 때문에 유배되었다는 것을

sentences.original_text: because they were unfaithful to me
So I hid my face from them
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 나는 그들에게서 내 얼굴을 숨겼다

sentences.original_text: and handed them over to their enemies
and they all fell by the sword
